document.full_text: carmelo anthony scored 42 points but the knicks lost a late lead in boston for the second straight game. the knicks are down 2-0 in the series as it heads back to new york on friday.
document.title: celtics 96, knicks 93: anthony gives his all, but it isn't enough
lines_and_colors: carmelo anthony scored 42 points but the knicks lost a late lead in boston for the second straight game. the knicks are down 2-0 in the series as it heads back to new york on friday.
